Reviews.Title: “Great location... that's it”
Reviews.Author: Lei811
Reviews.Content: location excellent close shopping dining 5minute walk train station hotel basic ideal looking spend night clean basic services offered breakfast morning cleaning service day hotel restaurant bar parking street hotels building floors creak walk oh bed possibly hardest bed slept

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and friendly place”
Reviews.Author: Dovndyr
Reviews.Content: stayed week 3 single 35 euros night aprox 45 dollars wich bit doubleroom plesent person bed doublebed everyhing ok clean friend stayed hotels junior suite huge nice balcony view berlin top tube hardly guess funny smell beginning day toilet broken key 4 bed door wich seemd ok ore friends berlin morning theres nice breakfast maybe ritz hey breakfast cost 35 euros pretty nice trying help

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet, and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: zooks
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights christmas 2010 offered due smell smoke hotel overlooking garden couldnt fault friendliness helpfulness staff location superb walking 15 minutes centre berlin bear mind berlin city debatable centre actually convenient buses 2 mins trains 5 mins plenty food breakfast plenty hot water weather outside below freezing hotels heating system adequate jaded worth 3 rating lots eating close

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: ikapl
Reviews.Content: friendly helpful staff fast economical bus connection tegel location street kudamm convenient public transportation included 4 beds plus pullout couch charming balcony bathroom recently renovated furnishings shape thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel astrid

Reviews.Title: “Old-fashioned, cheap, quiet hotel in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: jeff22London
Reviews.Content: adequate safe shower bit difficult access reasonable selection breakfast including boiled eggs youre late staff friendly particularly manageress spoke decent english entrance 1st floor staircase antiquated lift excellent location sbahn savignyplatz alexanderplatz wonderful overview city favourite restaurant hundred metres towards sbahn road hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Astrid Hotel am Kurfurstendamm
HotelInfo.Address: Bleibtreustrasse 20, 10623 Berlin, Germany
